title: Futari no Musuko ni Nerawarete Imasu
description:
Keiichi is raising his twin sons, Ren and Takumi, who aren't related to him by blood. Ren is a promising future researcher and Takumi is a national swimmer. Keiichi's always wanted to give his two excellent sons whatever they wish for, but on their twentieth birthday, they unexpectedly started pestering him about...
 
"They want... my body?!"
